artist: Artist: Trevor Alixopulos , et al.; Printer: Stumptown Printers, Portland; Publisher: Comixville Collective, Portland
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress text and a photomechanical illustration of flexing pens, an eraser, and a stapler printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 24 pp.
title: Comixville, no. 3
